mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sku.id AS sku_id,sku.name AS sku_name,sku.property_id AS sku_property_id, sku.sort AS sku_sort,sku.remark AS sku_remark FROM sys_role_sys_menu AS srsm LEFT JOIN shop_sku AS sku ON srsm.sys_menu_id=sku.id WHERE srsm.sys_role_id IN( SELECT DISTINCT susr.sys_role_id FROM sys_user_sys_role AS susr LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=susr.sys_role_id WHERE susr.sys_user_id=#{userId} AND sr.del_flag='Y' AND sr.useable='Y' ) AND sku.del_flag='Y' AND sku.show_flag='Y'
